dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3177 IH: Keeping Our Commitment to Disabled Veterans Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Issa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the requirement to provide nursing home care to certain veterans with service-connected disabilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keeping Our Commitment to Disabled Veterans Act of 2017.

section.header: Extension of requirement to provide nursing home care to certain veterans with service-connected disabilities
section.text: Section 1710A(d) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2017 and inserting December 31, 2018.
